column4: Okay - here is a tough problem. My friend is trying to install Ubuntu but has only a non-bootable USB cdrom. Does anyone know of anything that will let us run the cdrom install, some sort of boot disk or something?
Perhaps we need a boot disk for a linux distro that will let us then mount the usb device and then boot it
- I just mean some sort of boot disk or distro on disk that will allow me to run the Ubuntu install from the USB cdrom
